p: To confirm the relevance of iron chelation as mechanism of the anti-HCMV action of eltrombopag using a clinical virus isolate, U1-infected HFFs were treated with equimolar concentrations of eltrombopag and Fe(III)Cl 3. The presence of equimolar Fe 3+ concentrations prevented the eltrombopag-induced inhibition of HCMV LA expression in U1-infected cells in a comparable fashion ( Figure 5B), as in Hi91-infected cells ( Figure 3B).
